title: What smart people in economics and business are saying about Kevin Warsh's nomination as Fed chair
full_text: What smart people in economics and business are saying about Kevin Warsh's nomination as Fed chair. Reactions are already pouring in from prominent economists and business leaders about President Donald Trump nominating Kevin Warsh.. Kevin Warsh is the new chair of the US Federal Reserve.Tasos Katopodis/Getty Images for Semafor <ul><li>Kevin Warsh has been nominated by President Donald Trump to become the Federal Reserve chair.<… [+3926 chars]
